name: 韋光正
objective:
二十一世紀初，媒介風潮席捲全球，而媒介如何塑造今日世界始終充滿爭議。因此，有必要在傳播媒體和社會之間建構更清楚的定義，亦即對傳播媒介結構、內容和媒介影響力，提出各種令人信服的解釋。在宏觀的歷史架構下，應用政治、社會、文化與經濟等相關理論來形塑整個大眾媒介的發展焦點。同時探討新興媒介與社會的互動關係。

While the media storm is globalize in the 21st Century, there are a lot of debates of how the media is going to reform the new world. Hence it is necessary to clarify the definition between the media environment and the society, more compelling explanations of the mass communication structure, content and influence are needed. In this class we will discuss the focus of the reform of the development of mass media in terms of political, social and cultural effects in a macroscopic historical point of view. And the international relationship between new risen media and society is also going to be discussed.
